SETTINGS.runOnStartup_DESC: Run AutoHotPie when you login to your computer

NEW_PIE_WIZARD.Q_PIE_MENU_NAME: What do you want to name your pie menu?
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.HINT_PIE_MENU_NAME: Give your pie menu a lovely new name...
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.Q_ASSIGN_HOTKEY: Assign a hotkey to your pie menu!
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.ASSIGN_HOTKEY_DESC: Press the hotkey you want to assign to this pie menu
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.Q_SELECTION_MODE: Which selection mode do you want to use?
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.SELECTION_MODE_1_DESC: Select an item by hovering over it
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.SELECTION_MODE_2_DESC: Select an item by clicking on it
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.SELECTION_MODE_3_DESC: Select an item by hovering over it and clicking on it
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.SELECTION_MODE_4_DESC: Select an item by hovering over it and pressing the hotkey
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.Q_CUSTOMIZATION: How about giving your pie menu a custom look?
NEW_PIE_WIZARD.CUSTOMIZATION_DESC: You can customize the look of your pie menu by selecting a preset below or by choosing your own colors.

HOME.TITLE: App works !
HOME.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete this pie menu?
HOME.TABLE_EMPTY: You haven't added any pie menus yet. Click the button below to add one. ฅ^ ̳• ·̫ • ̳^ฅ
